directions: Cut the shrimp into 2 or 3 pieces and place in a large bowl; add the avocado, green onion, red and yellow tomatoes, bell pepper, cilantro, and lime juice; mix. Season with salt and pepper. Refrigerate at least 15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds cooked deveined shelled shrimp, tail shells removed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Avocado-Lime Shrimp Salad (Ensalada de Camarones con Aguacate y Limon)
